author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is intended to fix a bug in the GenError object that is responsible for the poor performance of the generic reconstruction with Irradiation Bias Correction switched on. This is very relevant for the performance of the Pixel detector in Run3 studies.
The fix has been provided by M. Swartz and JHU group (@pmaksim1 @cmantill @OzAmram )

#### PR validation:

Enclosed are the plots illustrating the issue and the performance after the fix is applied. 
Results are shown for templates and generic reconstruction with and without the Irradiation Bias Correction and with the bug [left hand side] and with the bug fixed [right hand side]. As you can see, without the bug fix the resolution in the central region is significantly degraded,

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/60272564-b8b7b480-98f4-11e9-941e-4c3d5c31ae49.png)
